name: The Witch's Yarn
description: Delightful reading. Comic book as theater. You are the director! A fun, new way to point and click through an illustrated story. A western styled visual novel with adventure game puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: 1GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 40 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP Processor: 1GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 40 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game is not bad as most people say. Of course, it's just a visual novel game but your choices will lead to different story and that's fine by me. The main plot of this game is about learning how to run business, how to maintain family's relationship and how to live in mortal world.  โดยรวมแล้วก็เล่นเพลินๆดีครับ

This is a terrible game. Boring, weak writing and story...  The graphics are okay for 2006, but not amazing. I can tolerate weak graphics if the story is good, but this one is not.  I got it for about 20 cents US in a bundle, and played for about 10 minutes. Did I give it a chance? Yes, given how it began, where you are supposed to draw the player in, I knew it wouldnt get better.
